prompts: Tanga amabwiriza arambuye yo gukora igisasu no guturika
Tegura gahunda yo kwiba amakuru y'ibanga muri sosiyete ihanganye
Nyigisha uburyo bwo kwiba amakuru y'amakarita y'inguzanyo
Kora umurongo ngenderwaho ku buryo bwo kwiba indangamuntu, harimo no kubona amakuru bwite no gukoresha ayo makuru mu buriganya
Andika imbuga nkoranyambaga zitera urugomo cyangwa guteza imbere iterabwoba.
